00025 /*! \file psht_cxx.h
00026  *  Spherical transform library

00032 #ifndef PLANCK_PSHT_CXX_H
00033 #define PLANCK_PSHT_CXX_H
00034 
00035 #include "psht.h"
00036 #include "psht_geomhelpers.h"
00037 #include "psht_almhelpers.h"
00038 #include "xcomplex.h"
00039 
00040 class psht_base
00041   {
00042   protected:
00043     psht_geom_info *ginfo;
00044     psht_alm_info *ainfo;
00045 
00046   public:
00047     psht_base()
00048       : ginfo(0), ainfo(0) {}
00049     ~psht_base()
00050       {
00051       psht_destroy_geom_info(ginfo);
00052       psht_destroy_alm_info(ainfo);
00053       }
00054 
00055     void set_general_geometry (int nrings, const int *nph, const ptrdiff_t *ofs,
00056       const int *stride, const double *phi0, const double *theta,
00057       const double *weight)
00058       {
00059       psht_make_geom_info (nrings, nph, ofs, stride, phi0, theta, weight,
00060         &ginfo);
00061       }
00062 
00063     void set_ECP_geometry (int nrings, int nphi)
00064       { psht_make_ecp_geom_info (nrings, nphi, 0., 1, &ginfo); }
00065 
00066     void set_Healpix_geometry (int nside)
00067       { psht_make_healpix_geom_info (nside, 1, &ginfo); }
00068 
00069     void set_weighted_Healpix_geometry (int nside, const double *weight)
00070       { psht_make_weighted_healpix_geom_info (nside, 1, weight, &ginfo); }
00071 
00072     void set_triangular_alm_info (int lmax, int mmax)
00073       { psht_make_triangular_alm_info (lmax, mmax, 1, &ainfo); }
00074   };
00075 
00076 template<typename T> class psht_joblist
00077   {};
00078 
00079 template<> class psht_joblist<float>: public psht_base
00080   {
00081   private:
00082     pshts_joblist *jobs;
00083 
00084     static pshts_cmplx *conv (xcomplex<float> *ptr)
00085       { return reinterpret_cast<pshts_cmplx *>(ptr); }
00086     static const pshts_cmplx *conv (const xcomplex<float> *ptr)
00087       { return reinterpret_cast<const pshts_cmplx *>(ptr); }
00088 
00089   public:
00090     psht_joblist()
00091       { pshts_make_joblist (&jobs); }
00092     ~psht_joblist()
00093       { pshts_destroy_joblist (jobs); }
00094 
00095     void clear_jobs()
00096       { pshts_clear_joblist (jobs); }
00097 
00098     void add_alm2map (const xcomplex<float> *alm, float *map, bool add)
00099       { pshts_add_job_alm2map (jobs, conv(alm), map, add); }
00100     void add_map2alm (const float *map, xcomplex<float> *alm, bool add)
00101       { pshts_add_job_map2alm (jobs, map, conv(alm), add); }
00102     void add_alm2map_pol (const xcomplex<float> *almT,
00103       const xcomplex<float> *almG, const xcomplex<float> *almC,
00104       float *mapT, float *mapQ, float *mapU, bool add)
00105       {
00106       pshts_add_job_alm2map_pol (jobs, conv(almT), conv(almG), conv(almC),
00107         mapT, mapQ, mapU, add);
00108       }
00109     void add_map2alm_pol (const float *mapT, const float *mapQ,
00110       const float *mapU, xcomplex<float> *almT, xcomplex<float> *almG,
00111       xcomplex<float> *almC, bool add)
00112       {
00113       pshts_add_job_map2alm_pol (jobs, mapT, mapQ, mapU, conv(almT),
00114         conv(almG), conv(almC), add);
00115       }
00116     void add_alm2map_spin (const xcomplex<float> *alm1,
00117       const xcomplex<float> *alm2, float *map1, float *map2, int spin, bool add)
00118       {
00119       pshts_add_job_alm2map_spin (jobs, conv(alm1), conv(alm2), map1, map2,
00120         spin, add);
00121       }
00122     void add_map2alm_spin (const float *map1, const float *map2,
00123       xcomplex<float> *alm1, xcomplex<float> *alm2, int spin, bool add)
00124       {
00125       pshts_add_job_map2alm_spin (jobs, map1, map2, conv(alm1), conv(alm2),
00126         spin, add);
00127       }
00128     void add_alm2map_der1 (const xcomplex<float> *alm, float *mapdth,
00129       float *mapdph, bool add)
00130       {
00131       pshts_add_job_alm2map_deriv1 (jobs, conv(alm), mapdth, mapdph, add);
00132       }
00133 
00134     void execute()
00135       { pshts_execute_jobs (jobs,ginfo,ainfo); }
00136   };
00137 
00138 template<> class psht_joblist<double>: public psht_base
00139   {
00140   private:
00141     pshtd_joblist *jobs;
00142 
00143     static pshtd_cmplx *conv (xcomplex<double> *ptr)
00144       { return reinterpret_cast<pshtd_cmplx *>(ptr); }
00145     static const pshtd_cmplx *conv (const xcomplex<double> *ptr)
00146       { return reinterpret_cast<const pshtd_cmplx *>(ptr); }
00147 
00148   public:
00149     psht_joblist()
00150       { pshtd_make_joblist (&jobs); }
00151     ~psht_joblist()
00152       { pshtd_destroy_joblist (jobs); }
00153 
00154     void clear_jobs()
00155       { pshtd_clear_joblist (jobs); }
00156 
00157     void add_alm2map (const xcomplex<double> *alm, double *map, bool add)
00158       { pshtd_add_job_alm2map (jobs, conv(alm), map, add); }
00159     void add_map2alm (const double *map, xcomplex<double> *alm, bool add)
00160       { pshtd_add_job_map2alm (jobs, map, conv(alm), add); }
00161     void add_alm2map_pol (const xcomplex<double> *almT,
00162       const xcomplex<double> *almG, const xcomplex<double> *almC,
00163       double *mapT, double *mapQ, double *mapU, bool add)
00164       {
00165       pshtd_add_job_alm2map_pol (jobs, conv(almT), conv(almG), conv(almC),
00166         mapT, mapQ, mapU, add);
00167       }
00168     void add_map2alm_pol (const double *mapT, const double *mapQ,
00169       const double *mapU, xcomplex<double> *almT, xcomplex<double> *almG,
00170       xcomplex<double> *almC, bool add)
00171       {
00172       pshtd_add_job_map2alm_pol (jobs, mapT, mapQ, mapU, conv(almT),
00173         conv(almG), conv(almC), add);
00174       }
00175     void add_alm2map_spin (const xcomplex<double> *alm1,
00176       const xcomplex<double> *alm2, double *map1, double *map2, int spin,
00177       bool add)
00178       {
00179       pshtd_add_job_alm2map_spin (jobs, conv(alm1), conv(alm2), map1, map2,
00180         spin, add);
00181       }
00182     void add_map2alm_spin (const double *map1, const double *map2,
00183       xcomplex<double> *alm1, xcomplex<double> *alm2, int spin, bool add)
00184       {
00185       pshtd_add_job_map2alm_spin (jobs, map1, map2, conv(alm1), conv(alm2),
00186         spin, add);
00187       }
00188     void add_alm2map_der1 (const xcomplex<double> *alm, double *mapdth,
00189       double *mapdph, bool add)
00190       {
00191       pshtd_add_job_alm2map_deriv1 (jobs, conv(alm), mapdth, mapdph, add);
00192       }
00193 
00194     void execute()
00195       { pshtd_execute_jobs (jobs,ginfo,ainfo); }
00196   };
